page.title: 05PETROCKSTOWE PEOPLE
page.content: There are some 300 inhabitants, with l child for every 3 adults & 3 males per 2 females,adult or child.58% of adults are Devon born,most within 15 miles of {Petrockstowe}if not actually from the village,& most are of Devon stock back through 3 or 4 generations. Those born in Hatherleigh (6 miles) regard them- selves as"outsiders" & South Devonians are{definitely}foreigners! The real outsiders come from as far afield as Tyneside/Yorkshire or Kent/Sussex, the largest hailing from London & Surrey. Generally they have been here only 10 years & came as they love the county or wanted to quit the "rat race".There are no coloured residents. The largest age group is 41-60yrs but the 26-40s is the second largest. The smallest group is 16-25,far outnumbered by both 4-10s & 11-16s & even by the infants. It seems schoolleavers leave the area.
